nodes.text: The Gundark Enclosure on Carlac was a area using a force-field to enclose a Gundark during the Skirmish on Carlac. A small camp was located outside the force-field. A group of scientists were studying it from a safe distance outside of the force-field.
This Gundark Enclosure first appeared in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)" as a location on Carlac that serves no purpose.
